title: Physical infrastructure provider
description: An organisation that owns and maintains passive network infrastructure, i.e. the non-electrical elements, such as dark fibre, ducts and physical sites.

title: Network provider
description: An organisation that operates active network infrastructure, i.e. the electrical elements, such as optical transceivers, switches and routers.

title: Funder
description: An organization that provides financing for the development or operation of a phase or network.
